Detailed Description

Intermediate transport stream IPMP control information part.

Intermediate part of the structure containing IPMP control information classes in a transport stream.

Definition at line 402 of file IIPMPControlInfoPart.h.

virtual const ByteT& DRMPlugin::MPEG2IPMPXDRMPlugin::IInterTStreamIPMPControlInfoPart::GetLastPartNumber (   )  const [pure virtual]
 

Get last part number.

Last part number represents index of the last part in a row of parts constituting an IPMP control information.

Returns:
Last part number.
